text: Emmerson Arthur Marbles (5 December 1878 – 1964) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1878 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Chesterfield Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Dronfield Town F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Eckington Works F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Arthur Marbles
